description:
Stretchy technical shorts for little explorers. Made from the same burly nylon blend as some of our most popular adult outdoor pants, the Adventure Stretch Shorts are ready to live up to their name.

  • Midweight nylon blend dries quickly and has a comfortable stretch
  • DWR finish helps keep these pants cleaner longer
  • UPF 50+ blocks UV during long days under the sun
  • 2 jeans-style front pockets and 2 back pockets leave lots of room for must-haves
  • Internal ID label is hand-me-down ready with extra space for names
  • Regular fits wears just like you want it to
name: MEC Adventure Stretch Shorts - Children
